page.title: 16ESTON NAB
page.content: On top of{Eston Hills,}stands a {monument}(erected in 1956)to mark the site of the{Beacon tower}which was erected by{Thomas Jackson}of Lackenby about{1800,}as a look out post against invasion during the{Napoleonic Wars and which again served the same purpose in the{Second World War}of 1939-1945.It stands within a{bronze {age}fortified camp which at the moment is being{excavated.}They have already found a{moat.}There also used to be a {house}where people could obtain tea for picnics. { The Wireless Relay Station}is used to provide Telemetry information on the Ekofisk oil field. It gives information on oil flows, gas pressures in the well head. { From the Nab{I.C.I and British Steel} look like toy models in the distance.
